#$b#你现在想做什么, 亲爱的?"/pause 500/question fork0 "你现在想去做什么?#去湖边放松一下。#一起去探索森林吧!"/fork lakeEnding/pause 200/speak {{Spouse}} "去森林探索?当然可以! 我从来没有深入过森林...#$b#但没有人比你更愿意和你一起探索它!"/pause 250/speak {{Spouse}} "准备好了, 让我们出发吧!"/pause 500/globalFade/viewport -1000 1000/playSound stairsdown/warp farmer 15 57/warp {{Spouse}} 13 57/faceDirection farmer 3/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 1/fade/viewport 21 56 true/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 250/speak {{Spouse}} "快过来, @! Entries.1116024_offered: pause 200/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 1/speak {{Spouse}} "怎么了, 亲爱的?#$b#你要帮我付钱吗?#$b#不用担心, 亲爱的! 你已经为我们做了这么多, 我想尽我所能地帮助你。"/pause 300/quickQuestion #让我来付吧#让 {{SpouseDisplayName}} 付钱(break)switchEvent 1116024_paid(break)switchEvent 1116024_spousepay
Entries.1116024_spousepay: pause 200/shake {{Spouse}} 250/playSound money/pause 200/speak {{Pierre}} "{{SpouseDisplayName}}, 感谢您来到皮埃尔杂货店购物!#$b#祝您今天愉快!"/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "谢谢! 也祝您今天愉快!"/pause 500/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 1/speak {{Spouse}} "谢谢你让我付钱, 亲爱的。我知道你工作很辛苦, 所以我只想让你的生活轻松一点。"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/switchEvent 1116024_end2
Entries.1116024_paid: pause 200/speak {{Spouse}} "!!!$l#$b#亲爱的, 我做了什么才值得你这样做吗?$l#$b#如果你真的坚持, 那么, 我想你这次帮我付吧...$l#$b#但下次让我来付钱, 好吗？$l"/pause 200/emote farmer 32/pause 200/move {{Spouse}} -1 0 1 true/move farmer -1 0 0 false/pause 400/playSound money/money -700/message "支付 700金。"/pause 200/speak {{Pierre}} "谢谢你, @! 祝您今天愉快!"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 400/switchEvent 1116024_end2

Entries.1116024_end2: pause 200/speak {{Spouse}} "亲爱的, 我们回家吧。"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/beginSimultaneousCommand/warp farmer 6 26/warp {{Spouse}} 7 26/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 3/endSimultaneousCommand/fade/viewport 9 23/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 300/speak {{Spouse}} "谢谢你来和我一起购物, @。我知道这不是最令人兴奋的事, 但当我和你一起做的时候就变得不一样。"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/speak {{Spouse}} "嘿, @...$l"/pause 400/message "{{SpouseDisplayName}} 在你耳边轻声"/speak {{Spouse}} "我们把这些食物带回家, 然后找点乐子, 好吗?$l"/pause 500/emote farmer 16/pause 200/speed farmer 7/faceDirection farmer 2/move farmer 0 2 2/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/move {{Spouse}} -1 0 2/move {{Spouse}} 0 2 2/warp {{Spouse}} -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/globalFade/viewport 1000 -1000/{{SuggestiveCommand}}/pause 400/playSound doorClose/pause 1250/speak {{Spouse}} "这真有趣, @....$l#$b#我想我以后会经常要求你和我一起去商店了...$l"/pause 500/message "我也想和 {{SpouseDisplayName}} 更经常的去商店了!"/pause 500/end dialogueWarpOut {{Spouse}} "再次感谢你, 亲爱的。你可以使任何无聊的事都感到特别。$l"

pause 200/speak {{Spouse}} "亲爱的, 我们回家吧。"/pause 200/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/beginSimultaneousCommand/warp farmer 6 26/warp {{Spouse}} 7 26/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 3/endSimultaneousCommand/fade/viewport 9 23/playMusic musicboxsong/pause 300/speak {{Spouse}} "谢谢你来和我一起购物, @。我知道这不是最令人兴奋的事, 但当我和你一起做的时候就变得不一样。"/pause 200/emote farmer 20/speak {{Spouse}} "走吧, 我们现在回家放松一下吧。"/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 2/move farmer 0 2 2/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/move {{Spouse}} -1 0 2/move {{Spouse}} 0 2 2/warp {{Spouse}} -1000 -1000/playSound doorClose/globalFade/viewport 1000 -1000/pause 1250/speak {{Spouse}} "这真有趣, @。$l#$b#我想我以后会经常要求你和我一起去商店了!$l"/pause 500/message "我也想和 {{SpouseDisplayName}} 更经常的去商店了!"/pause 500/end dialogueWarpOut {{Spouse}} "再次感谢你, 亲爱的。你可以使任何无聊的事都感到特别。$l"

Entries.1116025/f {{Spouse}} {{MinFriendship}}/O: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 {{Spouse}} -100 -100 2/skippable/warp {{Spouse}} -100 -100/warp farmer -100 -100/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 2/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/warp {{Spouse}} 64 15/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/speak {{Spouse}} "{{Random:嘿, @... @@ 亲爱的, 你先别走... @@ @, 等一下! @@ 亲爱的, 等等。 |inputSeparator=@@}}"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "今天天气真好...#$b#我在想, 如果你也许想, 呃...$l#$b#...今晚和我一起去露营吗?$l#$b#这很有趣, 只有我和你身处宁静的大自然中。"/pause 1000/question fork0 "与 {{SpouseDisplayName}} 约会吗?#好的#不了"/fork dateYes/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote {{Spouse}} 28/speak {{Spouse}} "噢...$s#$b#又很忙吗?$s"/pause 500/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 3 true/pause 1000/emote {{Spouse}} 40/pause 400/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 2/pause 400/speak {{Spouse}} "没关系, 我们以后有时间再去做, 你回去工作吧。"/pause 800/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection {{Spouse}} 0/pause 400/playSound doorClose/warp {{Spouse}} -100 -100/pause 2000/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "不用担心, 我知道你很忙...当我嫁给你的时候, 我就知道我该做什么。"
Entries.dateYes: pause 200/addMailReceived campingDateAgree/emote {{Spouse}} 20/pause 500/speak {{Spouse}} "谢谢你, @! 我们晚上8点后在煤矿森林见面吧, 我会安排好一切。#$b#我迫不及待地想在那里见到你! 哦, 记得在来之前完成你的所有工作。我们将在一起度过整个夜晚!$h"/pause 500/end dialogue {{Spouse}} "我会为我们今晚的约会准备好一切的, @。$h#$b#你只要在今晚8点以后到森林里就可以了!$h#$b#别忘了!"
